thread.title: Last Chance to Make Your 50 on Fire Nomination
thread.title_full: Last Chance to Make Your 50 on Fire Nomination

author: Christine Healy
title: Last Chance to Make Your 50 on Fire Nomination
text:
SHARE Last Chance to Make Your 50 on Fire Nomination Submit your 50 on Fire nomination here!Have you been waiting to make your 50 on Fire nomination? Act now because there's just one day left TO Submit your 50 on Fire nomination here! 
Have you been waiting to make your 50 on Fire nomination? Act now because there's just one day left to tell us which individuals and companies have been heating up D.C. and disrupting their industries. Send us your top game-changers in Civic (Smart City) , Design , Education , Government & Advocacy , Healthcare & Medicine , Investment , Lifestyle , Marketing & Advertising , and Technology . 
Next week, we'll reveal the 150 finalists. Then, join us for the 50 on Fire winners reveal at Howard Theatre on Dec. 10th from 7 to 10 p.m. It will be a red-hot celebration of District's hottest innovators and lumanaries. Early bird ticket discounts are available now, so get your 50 on Fire tickets today! 
Leading up to the big event, we're also hosting Meet the Judges Meetups this fall that will provide a more intimate opportunity to connect with our expert judges. Join us at the next meetup at 1777 North Kent on Thursday, Nov. 5th from 6 to 8pm. Get your $10 ticket, which includes drinks and hors d'oeurves, here . 
Submit a nomination now and take advantage of your last chance to buy Early bird tickets here or below. Want to align your brand with 50 on Fire and DC Inno events? Click here for more information. Thank you to our event sponsor. From Our Partners
